                      String siteId,

        the top function for getting the reviews. This pushes these review content into the security advisor.

        siteId -

      • getReviewsByParentAndTypes

        List getReviewsByParentAndTypes(String parentId,
                              int[] types,
                              String siteId,
                              String producer)
        Returns a list of reviews for the given criteria
        Parameters:
        parentId - - the parentId of the review
        types - - array of types to search for
        siteId - - the siteId of the review
        producer -
        Returns:
        List of Review

      • getReviewsByMatrix

        List<Review> getReviewsByMatrix(String matrixId)
        Retrieve all reviews for all cells in a user's matrix. This does not push the content to the security advisor since its purpose is bulk list efficiency.
        Parameters:
        matrixId - - the ID of the user's matrix
        Returns:
        List of Review of all types

      • getReviewsByMatrixAndType

        List<Review> getReviewsByMatrixAndType(String matrixId,
                                     int type)
        Retrieve all reviews of a given type for all cells in a user's matrix. This does not push the content to the security advisor since its purpose is bulk list efficiency.
        Parameters:
        matrixId - the ID of the user's matrix
        type - the desired type of review
        Returns:
        List of Review of all types
